maqras.text: 82|1|jab aakaash phat jaayega.
82|2|tatha jab taare jhad jaayenge.
82|3|aur jab saagar ubal padenge.
82|4|aur jab samaadhiyaan (qabaren) khol dee jaayengee.
82|5|tab pratyek praanee ko gyaan ho jaayega, jo usane kiya hai aur nahin kiya hai.
82|6|he insaan! tujhe kis vastu ne tere udaar paalanahaar se bahaka diya
82|7|jisane teree rachana kee, phir tujhe santulit banaaya.
82|8|jis roop mein chaaha bana diya.
82|9|vaastav mein tum pratiphal (pralay) ke din ko nahin maanate.
82|10|jabaki tumapar nireekshak (paasabaan) hain.
82|11|jo maananeey lekhak hain.
82|12|ve jo kuchh tum karate ho, jaanate hain.
82|13|nihsandeh, sadaachaaree sukhon mein honge.
82|14|aur duraachaaree narak mein.
82|15|pratikaar (badale) ke din usamen jhonk diye jaayenge.
82|16|aur ve usase bach rahane vaale nahin.
82|17|aur tum kya jaano ki badale ka din kya hai
82|18|phir tum kya jaano ki badale ka din kya hai
82|19|jis din kisee ka kisee ke lie koee adhikaar nahin hoga aur us din sab adhikaar allaah ka hoga.
83|1|vinaash hai dandee maarane vaalon ka.
83|2|jo logon se naap kar len,, to poora lete hain.
83|3|aur jab unhen naap ya tol kar dete hain, to kam dete hain.
83|4|kya ve nahin sochate ki phir jeevit kiye jaayenge
83|5|ek bheeshan din ke lie.
83|6|jis din sabhee, vishv ke paalanahaar ke saamane khade honge.
83|7|kadaapi aisa na karo, nishchay buron ka karm patr "sijjeen" mein hai.
83|8|aur tum kya jaano ki "sijjeen" kya hai
83|9|vah likhit mahaan pustak hai.
83|10|us din jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie vinaash hai.
83|11|jo pratikaar (badale) ke din ko jhuthalaate hain.
83|12|tatha use vahee jhuthalaata hai, jo maha atyaachaaree aur paapee hai.
83|13|jab unake saamane hamaaree aayaton ka adhyayan kiya jaata hai, to kahate hain: poorvajon kee kalpit kathaayen hain.
83|14|suno! unake dilon par kukarmon ke kaaran lohamal lag gaya hai.
83|15|nishchay ve us din apane paalanahaar (ke darshan) se rok diye jaayenge.
83|16|phir ve narak mein jaayenge.
83|17|phir kaha jaayega ki yahee hai, jise tum mithya maanate the.
83|18|sach ye hai ki sadaachaariyon ke karm patr "illiyyeen" mein hain.
83|19|aur tum kya jaano ki "illiyyeen" kya hai
83|20|ek ankit pustak hai.
83|21|jisake paas sameepavartee (pharishte) upasthit rahate hain.
83|22|nishachay, sadaachaaree aanand mein honge.
83|23|sinhaasanon ke oopar baithakar sab kuchh dekh rahe honge.
83|24|tum unake mukhon se aanand ke chinh anubhav karoge.
83|25|unhen muhar lagee shudhd madira pilaee jaayegee.
83|26|ye muhar kastooree kee hogee. to isakee abhilaasha karane vaalon ko isakee abhilaasha karanee chaahiye.
83|27|usamen tasaneem milee hogee.
83|28|vah ek srot hai, jisase allaah ke sameepavartee piyenge.
83|29|paapee (sansaar mein) eemaan laane vaalon par hansate the.
83|30|aur jab unake paas se guzarate, to aankhen michakaate the.
83|31|aur jab apane parivaar mein vaapas jaate, to aanand lete hue vaapas hote the.
83|32|aur jab unhen (mominon ko) dekhate, to kahate theh yahee bhatake hue log hain.
83|33|jabaki ve unake nireekshak banaakar nahin bheje gaye the.
83|34|to jo eemaan laaye, aaj kaafiron par hans rahe hain.
83|35|sinhaasanon ke oopar se unhen dekh rahe hain.
83|36|kya kaafiron (vishvaas heenon) ko unaka badala de diya gaya
